nodes.bodyText: Why are some tags beta::[] but others beta[]?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -10,7 +10,7 @@
 Deletes an existing trained {infer} model that is currently not referenced by an
 ingest pipeline.
 
-experimental[]
+beta[]

nodes.bodyText: I think the latter was the pre-Asciidoctor format.  Since https://github.com/elastic/docs#using-the-beta-admonition recommends the former, I'll make them all the same.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -10,7 +10,7 @@
 Deletes an existing trained {infer} model that is currently not referenced by an
 ingest pipeline.
 
-experimental[]
+beta[]
